attributes.additional_details:
Please consult with the police and encourage each constabulary  to monitor  and  report  on  each and every reported incident  of dangerous and aggressive dogs,   when they cause  injury  to people or to other animals.
There should be a line item  in the crime figures    "Dangerous dog attacks"

Some police officers currently  "fob you off"   when members of the public report  on  aggressive dogs making an attack  on the public highway.
Too  many aggressive dogs  are being allowed  to roam the streets  and  some police  officers  seem  "not bothered"   when serious incidents are reported to them.

Police officers  need to be  trained  on the correct response  when attending  dog attack incidents.
